sentences.en: ‘I’ve decided to accept the job.’ ‘I’m glad.’
sentences.cn: “我决定接受这份工作。”“我很高兴。”

sentences.en: "He speaks well of you." — "I'm glad to hear that."
sentences.cn: “他对你评价很高。”——“真高兴听到这个。”

sentences.en: Hello, Dolph. Glad I caught you.
I am glad it's all over.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴一切都结束了。

sentences.en: I am so glad that you have brought this to my notice.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴你让我注意到了这件事情。

sentences.en: I can't tell you how glad I was to leave that place.
sentences.cn: 我无法形容自己离开那个地方心里有多高兴。

sentences.en: I ought to be glad about what happened.
sentences.cn: 我对发生的事情应该感到高兴才是。

sentences.en: I’d be glad if you’d let me know when the funeral is.
sentences.cn: 如果你能告诉我葬礼的时间，我将非常感激。

sentences.en: I'd be glad to lend a hand.
I'm glad that you're over the flu.
sentences.cn: 你的流感好了，我真高兴。

sentences.en: I'm so glad he had a pang of conscience.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴他会有负疚感。

sentences.en: I'm so glad that we've found you at last!
sentences.cn: 我们终于找到你了，我真是太高兴了！

sentences.en: I'm so glad to see you back where you belong.
sentences.cn: 我真高兴看到你又回到了属于你自己的天地。

sentences.en: Oh, I'm so glad you're here.
sentences.cn: 哈，你在这儿我太高兴了。

sentences.en: She was feeling tired and was glad to lean against him.
sentences.cn: 她正感到有些疲倦，因此很高兴可以靠在他身上。

sentences.en: We were glad to be on dry land again.
sentences.cn: 再一次踏上陆地我们很高兴。

sentences.en: We will be glad to send you any information you may need.
sentences.cn: 中文例句: 您若需要什么资料，我们很乐意寄给您。

sentences.en: You can't think how glad I was to see them all go.
sentences.cn: 你都想象不到，我看到他们全都走了，心里是多么高兴。

trans.tran_cn: 高兴的，感激的，乐意的，令人愉快的
(Glad)人名；(塞、瑞典)格拉德；(英)格莱德；(法、挪)格拉
